extends CcddInformationTreeHandler
    CFS Command and Data Dictionary link tree handler class

                    CcddUndoHandler undoHandler,
                    java.lang.String rateName,
                    java.awt.Component parent)
        Link tree handler class constructor
        Parameters:
        ccddMain - main class
        undoHandler - reference to the undo handler
        rateName - data stream rate column name associated with the tree; used to filter the links added to the link tree
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog

        Parameters:

        linkName - link name

      • removeSelectedLinks

        protected void removeSelectedLinks()

      • buildTree

        protected void buildTree(boolean filterByApp,
                         java.lang.String filterValue,
                         boolean filterFlag,
                         java.awt.Component parent)
        Build the link tree from the database
        Overrides:
        buildTree in class CcddInformationTreeHandler
        Parameters:
        filterByApp - true if the tree is filtered by application. This is not applicable to the link tree, which can only contain structure references
        filterValue - string value that may be used to modify the tree building method; null or blank if not filtering
        filterFlag - flag used to filter the tree content. Not used for the link tree
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog

      • addLeafDefinition

        protected void addLeafDefinition(java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> treeDefns,
                                 java.lang.String[] leafDefn,
                                 java.lang.String filterValue)
        Add the specified leaf definition to the tree definition list. Override this method to insert the data stream rate column name into the leaf definition
        Overrides:
        addLeafDefinition in class CcddInformationTreeHandler
        Parameters:
        treeDefns - list to which to add the leaf definition
        leafDefn - leaf definition to add to the list

      • removeExtraText

        protected java.lang.String removeExtraText(java.lang.String text)
        Override so that HTML tag(s) and text within parentheses (inclusive) preceded by a space (the rate and size) is removed
        Overrides:
        removeExtraText in class CcddCommonTreeHandler
        Parameters:
        text - string from which to remove the extra text
        Returns:
        Input string minus any HTML tag(s) and text within parentheses (inclusive) preceded by a space

      • adjustNodeText

        protected void adjustNodeText(CcddClassesComponent.ToolTipTreeNode startNode)
        Append the sample rate and size in bytes to the nodes representing a link name. Set the node text color based on the currently selected sample rate and the rate of the link to which the node belongs: black for a match and gray for a mismatch
        Parameters:
        startNode - starting node for which to adjust the text and color

      • removeSelectedNodes

        protected void removeSelectedNodes()
        Remove the currently selected node(s) from the tree. If the parent node of a removed node no longer has any descendants after the removal then remove the parent node as well. Continue this process of removing nodes without descendants all the way up the tree, but not including the top level node

      • getLinksMatchingRate

        protected CcddClassesComponent.ToolTipTreeNode getLinksMatchingRate(java.lang.String rootNodeName,
                                                                    java.lang.String rootNodeDescription)
        Create a subtree with only the links that contain variables with sample rates matching the selected rate
        Parameters:
        rootNodeName - name of the root node for the matching links
        rootNodeDescription - tool tip text for the root node
        Returns:
        Node with only the links that contain variables with sample rates matching the selected rate

      • createTreePanel

        protected javax.swing.JPanel createTreePanel(java.lang.String label,
                                             int selectionMode)
        Create a link tree panel. The table tree is placed in a scroll pane. A check box is added that allows tree expansion/collapse
        Parameters:
        label - link tree title
        selectionMode - tree item selection mode (single versus multiple)
        Returns:
        JPanel containing the link tree components
